text:
Hi can any one help which one do I need for using Associations AP I (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/associations>), I checked with the API document, there are two different php download --- composer require HubSpot/api-client and
<https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-api-php|HubSpot-api-php>, which one do I need? (please note: I am not going to create app). Thanks.
